nodes.text: Wexlann Tarn was an unusual bounty hunter, in that his motivations for entering the profession were very different from most. Like many hunters, Tarn was in it for the money—what was unusual was his purpose for seeking this money. Tarn was a connoisseur of fine art and collectibles, and took bounties as a way of financing his personal art collection. Although he had a family fortune which he could have used to purchase his art, Tarn preferred to work as a bounty hunter to "earn" his prized possessions.
